text: Come Come Come Upward () is a 1989 South Korean film directed by Im Kwon-taek. ==Plot== The film examines the differing lives of two young women who are linked by their affiliation with a Buddhist temple. ==Accolades== * Best Film: Grand Bell AwardsAwards based on and * Best Actress, Bronze St. George (Kang Soo-yeon); 16th Moscow International Film Festival * Special Prize Im Kwon- taek; Moscow International Film Festival ; Nominated * Golden St. George (Im Kwon-taek); Moscow International Film Festival ==Notes== ==Sources== * * * * * Category:1989 films Category:Films directed by Im Kwon-taek Category:Best Picture Grand Bell Award winners Category:Korean-language films Category:South Korean films Category:South Korean drama films
title: Come Come Come Upward
